TopicTitle: When they add weather, do you think............

Articles.Content: When they add weather, do you think that wind will affect our rockets, and could we have a weather station to see the best time for flights, like we have real weather
I want planet specific hazards.eg duststorms on duna,lightning on eve driven by the oceans,high temperature danger on moho...
When they add weather, we're going to have a flood of pictures of Jeb riding an SRB in a hurricane.
